title: Email message body contrast
creator: mhp3jv
content:
Hello I noticed the email's message body section, there is a noticeable contrast against the app's theme background. Please see attached screenshot. I digged through the settings and can't quite the right option to fix this.

Essentially the message body's background is pure white and the app's background is a light color but not white. This is observed on both thunder bird android and k9 mail
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/134.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Android 15

title: Not receiving mail on Android smartphone after configuring using the barcode from Thunderbird desktop.
creator: frankmx111
content:
Ich nutze Thunderbird auf dem PC ohne Probleme mit fünf Mailadressen. Jetzt habe ich die App Version auf mein Android Smartphone geladen mit dem Barcodescanner. Ich kann eMails versenden aber ich empfange auf keiner der Mailadressen eine Nachricht über die App Version. Auf der PC Version kommen die Nachrichten an.

Translation: I use Thunderbird on my PC with five email addresses without any problems. I've now downloaded the app version to my Android smartphone with the barcode scanner. I can send emails, but I'm not receiving any messages from the app version at any of the email addresses. Messages arrive on the PC version.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/134.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36 OPR/88.0.0.0;kb_visits_prior:["/de/kb/probleme-senden-und-empfangen-nachrichten"]
